live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.
We continue to track multiple hydro related outages in the Winnipeg region. Shaw techs are on standby to assist with restoring our services when Manitoba Hydro completes their repairs.
We await restoration of hydro power to be restored in the affected areas. Once hydro is restored our services will begin to come online.

live_updates: Manitoba Hydro is on site making repairs. Once Hydro repairs have been completed, we expect Shaw services to come back online. Thank you for your patience.
